CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, June 20, 1953, pg. 23 reads: "Courier's Pittsburgh Home Service Fair...10. NATIONAL MERCHANTS - David Watson, national representative of the Pepsi-Cola Company, reminds audience to buy Pepsi-Cola as William Clyde Page, national promotion manager and director of Courier Home Service Fairs, listens. A portion of the sparkling Crosley kitchen used by Mrs. Handy may be seen...All Photos by Harris"
TitMainTitle: William Clyde Page, and David Watson promoting Pepsi products in front of audience at the 1953 Pittsburgh Courier Home Service Fair, Ammon Center
CatSubject_tab: Signs--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Crowds--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Women--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Men--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Ammon Center (Pittsburgh, Pa.)Pittsburgh Courier Home Service Fair.
